BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PIST_EMP_OFFICAL_DTL (STR_EMP_NO, NUM_SL_NO, NUM_FINNUM_ID, STR_IS_SAL_ACCOUNT, STR_APPICABILITY, STR_SUBMIT_STATUS, STR_NUMBER, STR_REMARKS,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
DELETE FROM PIST_EMP_OFFICAL_DTL A WHERE A.STR_EMP_NO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO PIST_EMP_OFFICAL_DTL (STR_EMP_NO, NUM_SL_NO, NUM_FINNUM_ID, STR_IS_SAL_ACCOUNT, STR_APPICABILITY, STR_SUBMIT_STATUS, STR_NUMBER, STR_REMARKS,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE PIST_EMP_OFFICAL_DTL A SET A.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE A.STR_EMP_NO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
